item.title: COMIL CAMPIONE 3.25 MULTI CHASSIS 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 1, 2025

COMIL CAMPIONE 3.25 MULTI CHASSIS 1.53 ETS2

The Comil Campione 3.25 Multi Chassis mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a versatile and detailed intercity coach bus with support for multiple chassis configurations. It features high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine and transmission sounds, smooth handling, and functional dashboard instruments. The mod includes customization options such as liveries, lighting, and accessories. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is ideal for players who enjoy realistic and comfortable passenger transport across diverse routes.

Credits: mulverso

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: C&C U PLUS TRUCK 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 1, 2025

C&C U PLUS TRUCK 1.53 ETS2

The C&C U Plus Truck mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a modern Chinese heavy-duty truck known for its robust design and efficient performance. It features high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine sounds, smooth driving physics, and functional dashboard elements. The mod includes various customization options, such as paint jobs, chassis types, accessories, and lighting. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players looking to experience a unique and powerful truck from the Chinese market.

Credits: QRA SOL

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Iveco HI-WAY 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 1, 2025

Iveco HI-WAY 1.53 ETS2

The IVECO Hi-Way mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a modern, fuel-efficient long-haul truck, known for its comfort and performance. It features high-quality 3D models, a detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics. The mod includes customization options such as chassis configurations, paint jobs, accessories, and lighting effects. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players looking for a reliable and realistic IVECO driving experience.

Credits: QRA SOL

You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. item.title: IVECO 410 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 1, 2025

IVECO 410 1.53 ETS2

The IVECO 410 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a reliable and powerful heavy-duty truck, popular in Brazilian and Latin American fleets. It features high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics. The mod offers customization options, including chassis types, paint jobs, accessories, and functional lighting. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is ideal for players looking for a strong, workhorse-style IVECO truck with regional authenticity.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

item.title: Vw Delivery 9-160 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 1, 2025

Vw Delivery 9-160 1.53 ETS2

The VW Delivery 9-160 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a compact and versatile urban delivery truck, widely used in Latin America. It features high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine sounds, and smooth driving physics, ideal for city routes and light cargo. The mod offers customization options, including paint jobs, accessories, and functional lighting. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players who enjoy local deliveries and small truck operations.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR CLASSE A
